categories: Category:World of Reading Star Wars Rebels: Level 1

nodes.text: Sabine's Art Attack is a young reader's World of Reading book from the Star Wars Rebels series that focuses on graffiti artist Sabine Wren. It was released on January 6, 2015.
Sabine is an artist on a mission! In this level 1 early reader, Sabine takes on an entire team of stormtroopers and adds her colorful mark to an Imperial TIE fighter.

Jennifer Heddle's Sabine's Art Attack adapts the events of the second Star Wars Rebels short, "Art Attack" into a 32 page young readers book. The book skips over the distraction portion of the short and just focuses on Wren's painting.
